dcterms:creator: Michał Romaszewski
Przemysław Głomb
Arkadiusz Sochan
Michał Cholewa
dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of multiple hyperspectral images of blood and blood-like substances such as artificial blood, tomato concentrate, or poster paint. The dataset is used to evaluate blood detection in hyperspectral images.
dcterms:title: Hyperspectral dataset of blood and blood-like substances

dcterms:creator: Farid Melgani
Lorenzo Bruzzone
dcterms:description: A well-known hyperspectral dataset used for classification tasks in remote sensing, particularly with support vector machines.
dcterms:title: Indian Pines

dcterms:creator: Farid Melgani
Lorenzo Bruzzone
dcterms:description: Another well-known hyperspectral dataset used for classification tasks in remote sensing, particularly with support vector machines.
dcterms:title: University of Pavia

dcterms:creator: Mattia Pedergnana
Prashanth Reddy Marpu
Mauro Dalla Mura
Jón Atli Benediktsson
Lorenzo Bruzzone
dcterms:description: A dataset used for optimal feature selection in hyperspectral images, particularly focusing on genetic algorithms.
dcterms:title: Hekla
